column4: Is the multiverse repository enabled on the machine which is fetching the files?

The online/connected machine has all repositories possible enabled. But the point is that whatever apt-offline says about how things are done, the "set" command is given at the offline/disconnected machine, as this is the entire point. Unless there's an undocumented first step that has to be done and make the offline machine aware of the repositories which it (understandably)misses.
And actually, the online machine doesn't even need to be Ubuntu, or linux at all for that matter.
